text: from a distance he looks like he could
be hitchhiking or begging for money but
edmond Aviv is here on the orders of an
Ohio judge
this is his sentence after being
convicted of offenses against his
neighbor and her severely disabled
children the accusations include
spitting at his neighbor racist
name-calling and trying to run down her
daughters who are in wheelchairs I would
hope that what's been achieved here is
finally the modicum of justice that they
had been hoping for for quite some time
Aviv was also sentenced to 15 days in
jail community service and
anger-management classes but the
punishment has raised questions about
whether public humiliation is a
sufficient sentence or an effective
deterrent he claims the judge who
sentenced him has ruined his life but
did not respond when reporters asked if
he was sorry for what he had done
grannie Harrington BBC News
